page.title: 16Visit To Chelsfield Pottery.
page.content: Chelsfield has a pottery of its own.It is run by {Mrs.Davidson} who invited us to have a look around.When we arrived Mrs.Davidson lined us up by a long table and showed us her kiln where she fires her work.When it is working it can reach very high temperatures sometimes as hot as 1300 centigrade. After seeing the {kiln} we the looked at the special safety equipment used when Mrs.Davidson unloads the finished pots. We all had a go at making a coil pot and we were shown how to use our thumbs to mould the wet clay into place. Mrs.Davidson then showed us some of the moulds that she uses to make the pot that she sells to the public.One of these was a model of {Prince Charles and Lady Diana}. Mrs.Davidson sells her pots in her shop in the village and before we left she gave each of us a model chess piece
